channel.title: Homepage of Commander Nitin Manocha
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Nitin Manocha

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Commander Nitin Manocha, an accomplished leader with expertise in aviation technology, quality assurance, digital transformation, and defense business development. Passionate about AI, data science, and academia. My academic journey includes an M.Tech in Aerospace Engineering from IISc Bengaluru, and a Defence Business Management Program from IIM Lucknow.

item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Currently serving as Associate Director – Quality Assurance at KAMS Global Bahrain, previously Deputy Director – Operations (Aviation Tech.) at Indian Navy. My expertise includes system safety, predictive maintenance, and digital transformation initiatives.

item.title: Education
item.description: Defence Business Management Program from IIM Lucknow, M.Tech in Aerospace Engineering from IISc Bengaluru, and B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering from Maharshi Dayanand University.

item.title: Technical Skills
item.description: Expert in System Safety (ARP4761, Mil-STD-882), Reliability Analysis (FMEA, FTA, RAMS), Predictive Maintenance, Digital Transformation, and AI & Data Science (Python, Power BI).
